data: When Miss Fox-Seton descended from the twopenny bus as it drew up, she gathered her trim tailor-made skirt about her with neatness and decorum, being well used to getting in and out of twopenny buses and to making her way across muddy London streets.
Emily Fox-Seton : being The making of a marchioness and The methods of Lady Walderhurst
